The T20I series ends in a draw, with both teams winning one match each.
Mark Adair's crucial 19th over where he took three wickets to dismantle South Africa's middle order
Matthew Humphreys took his first wicket of the series, dismissing Aiden Markram
Lungi Ngidi's excellent bowling performance with figures of 1 for 23 in four overs
Ross Adair offered South Africa multiple chances but survived due to fielding errors
The victory tied the two-match T20I series
South Africa comfortably won the first match at the same venue by eight wickets.
Lungi Ngidi was the most economical bowler for South Africa with figures of 4-0-23-1.
The match took place at Zayed Cricket Stadium in Abu Dhabi
The next contest between Ireland and South Africa will be a 3-match ODI series starting on October 2, 2024.
